channel.title: [SRL][RS2][DIVI]Nashi's AutoPwner ~ Last Update: 16th Oct 2007
channel.description:
[b][size=25pt]PLEASE POST PROGRESS REPORTS[/size][/b]
Presenting Nashi's AutoFighter :D
Features: 2 forms :O Fairly noob friendly Supports Range and Melee If using more then 1 player, they must be attacking same monster with same food [size=15pt]AUTO UPDATING, GLOBAL STATS![/size] ^Saves stats to your computer so to keep a record of your all together amount killed
A General Tip: Don't fight monsters that will take you a while to kill
It works very well so enjoy it =]
Please comment on the script if you download it.
[code]<=================================================> You are using Nashi's AutoPwner Worked For 1 Hours, 7 Minutes and 33 Seconds Z level Z 3 Has Killed About 116 Chicken's <=================================================>[/code]
[size=20pt]Download:[/size] http://www.freewebs.com/dafilestorage/Mitch/Scripts/AutoPwner/AutoPwner.html ^Approved Link

item.title: [SRL][RS2][DIVI]Nashi's AutoPwner ~ Last Update: 16th Oct 2007
item.dc:creator: @sk8rboidan sk8rboidan
item.description:
@sk8rboidan wrote:

hey nashi i had a couple of errors wonderin if u could fix them?
oh yeah you dotn mind if i post recomendations of this forum and u on other forums do you? if you do i won’t.

Line 367: [Error] (12634:19): Unknown identifier ‘GetSkillLevel’ in script
Line 370: [Error] (12637:19): Unknown identifier ‘GetSkillLevel’ in script
Line 373: [Error] (12640:19): Unknown identifier ‘GetSkillLevel’ in script
Line 376 [Error] (12643:19): Unknown identifier ‘GetSkillLevel’ in script
Line 379 [Error] (12646:19): Unknown identifier ‘GetSkillLevel’ in script
Line 432: [Hint] (10397:1): Variable ‘OLDMS’ never used in script
Line 558: [Error] (12825:1): Unknown identifier ‘RunAwayDirection’ in script
Line 559: [Error] (12826:1): Unknown identifier ‘RunAwayDirection’ in script
Line 567: [Error] (12834:1): Unknown identifier ‘RunAwayDirection’ in script
Line 568: [Error] (12835:1): Unknown identifier ‘RunAwayDirection’ in script
Line 1339: [Error] (13606:1): Unknown identifier ‘NickNameBMP’ in script

everything else compiled and executed perfectly
I have scar divi 3.12 so i dont think its a problem with the SRL or SCAR
plz post back thx![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2008, 08:05:35 PM[/size][hr]obviously only works for 3.12 or lower versions of scar possibly 3.13
cuz exactly 0 of the files, terms, srls, etc. exist and r compatable with 3.14, not being critical (sorry if it sounds i am i just cant find a single autoer that actually works, maybe urs does if i had a different version? mayeb i shud switch back to 3.12 where only 10 of the lines had problems, cuz those can be fixed i think) but could you mention which versions of scar it works for? lol and if u cud get back to my other post about the 10 lines that dont seem to work on scar 3.12 i would greatly appreciate it also which version of scar do u have? cuz obviously mine r unreliable and urs + a few select others actually work.

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2][DIVI]Nashi's AutoPwner ~ Last Update: 16th Oct 2007
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

[quote=“Nashi, post:87, topic:119347”]The reasons why the Script would cause SCAR to prompt you for access are:
To check the version number of the current script(For Updating) @ http://www.freewebs.com/dafilestorage/Mitch/Scripts/AutoPwner/Ver.html
& if required to Download from http://www.freewebs.com/dafilestorage/Mitch/Scripts/AutoPwner/AutoPwner.scar
To load Global stats from File C:\Program Files\SCAR\NashiAutoPwner\Stats.ini
To load the Player Array from C:\Program Files\SCAR\NashiAutoPwner\PlayerArray.txt

So allow whenever you are required to.

@Script,
That is a problem with SRL since It uses LogInPlayer;[/quote]
No it’s not because you use your own function of ClickHereToContinue.

I read your code.

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2][DIVI]Nashi's AutoPwner ~ Last Update: 16th Oct 2007
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

[quote=“Nashi, post:84, topic:119347”]KAttackMonster uses outfight which has no AntiRandoms or AntiBan,
I made my own procedure and Based it off of it, They are quite different, Besides the name.

//Needed function for this type of thing
function NashiRealEatifNeeded(foodcolor, eathp: Integer; foodlogout: Boolean): Boolean;

The SRL one doesn’t return a value so There is no way to check if They actually ate or not, and With my own Function, I can use it to increase the amount of Eats & the ReportVars.

By including these 2 functions and customing them instead of including the Entire Fighting.scar, I could decrease the Memory use? I might update it because I think it would make more sense to include, IsFightAt and InFight rather then including Fighting.scar just for those 2 and Making my own procedures for ones in there.
I’ll update the script to do those things.

Yes, I am well aware of the use of Forwards, However at the time of Making the bases of the script I thought they were required.
I only updated the script to compile when I came back to scripting.

However I’ve fixed this and will be updating now.
I was planning to update the antiban in future with an autotalker when people are near but I can leave for a later date.

Alright, My sites back up.

[size=15pt]UPDATE, DON’T REDOWNLOAD VIA MY WEBSITE, SIMPLY RUN IN SCAR, THE SCRIPT WILL UPDATE ITSELF =D[/size]

Also, @Ptzr;
Get SCAR 3.12[/quote]
Update the “Click Here to Continue” button, doesen’t work all to well.

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2][DIVI]Nashi's AutoPwner ~ Last Update: 16th Oct 2007
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

KAttackMonster uses outfight which has no AntiRandoms or AntiBan,
I made my own procedure and Based it off of it, They are quite different, Besides the name.

//Needed function for this type of thing
function NashiRealEatifNeeded(foodcolor, eathp: Integer; foodlogout: Boolean): Boolean;

The SRL one doesn’t return a value so There is no way to check if They actually ate or not, and With my own Function, I can use it to increase the amount of Eats & the ReportVars.

By including these 2 functions and customing them instead of including the Entire Fighting.scar, I could decrease the Memory use? I might update it because I think it would make more sense to include, IsFightAt and InFight rather then including Fighting.scar just for those 2 and Making my own procedures for ones in there.
I’ll update the script to do those things.

Yes, I am well aware of the use of Forwards, However at the time of Making the bases of the script I thought they were required.
I only updated the script to compile when I came back to scripting.

However I’ve fixed this and will be updating now.
I was planning to update the antiban in future with an autotalker when people are near but I can leave for a later date.

Alright, My sites back up.

[size=15pt]UPDATE, DON’T REDOWNLOAD VIA MY WEBSITE, SIMPLY RUN IN SCAR, THE SCRIPT WILL UPDATE ITSELF =D[/size]

Also, @Ptzr;
Get SCAR 3.12

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2][DIVI]Nashi's AutoPwner ~ Last Update: 16th Oct 2007
item.dc:creator: @the_scar_noob the scar noob
item.description:
@the_scar_noob wrote:

I see you have some good script, I just looked through your powercutter:p

As always, I want to give some feedback

  1. As first, try to not forward procedures/functions if you can, because it laggs SCAR, SCAR has to load it all the time, you see.

  2. I also see you make procedures/functions that are very simular than those alrady included in SRL, or ones that already excists, why not using the ones from SRL?

  3. Try to add more stuff in your antiban procedure

I hope that you’re glad that I gave some feedback

All above, nice lloking script, although the biggest part of the code is the form etc

Regards,

-Tsn.

Read full topic
